curriculum vitae.translation[0].definiti: a formal British expression for CV

curriculum vitae.translation[1].definiti: a document giving details of your education and past employment, used when you are applying for a job
Applicants should send a covering letter and curriculum vitae by 31 January.
a document on which a university teacher writes a list of their teaching experience and articles, books etc they have written when they are applying for a job
